item.title: Chinese AI Startup Manus Scores Funding at $500 Million Value
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The Chinese startup behind Manus AI secured a round of financing led by US venture firm Benchmark, scoring capital to explore the use of artificial intelligence agents to replace everyday tasks. The Silicon Valley investor was joined by several of the startupâ€™s existing backers in a $...
